title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jun 24 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jun 24 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: Reid vs. Rufo on CRT on MSNBC. Joy Reid's ratings at MSNBC are non-existent. Poll shows the United States ranks last in the world of 46 countries surveyed in trust in media. Rush's timeless wisdom on the Second Amendment and why it's essential for liberals to get rid of your guns. Callers on the Second Amendment, Libertarian slogans, and the lib invasion of North Carolina. Buck teases a big announcement coming.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
